phrases: Let us get all the desks pushed to the front.
I wonder if Yano's in the bathroom or something...
I cannot make it to rehearsal today, so get some to stand in for me.
I cannot make it to rehearsal today, so get some to stand in for me.
We cannot even start without the lead!
He must have turned off his cell phone.
He has no sense of responsibility.
He will get things done when they need to be done.
That is not the real problem here...
Geez... and I was looking forward to today, too...
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
In the end, Yano did not come to the rehearsal after that, either...
You are going to wear a yukata?
I do not think I will...
I also invited Yano and the others.
He skips out on practice, but he always shows up at times like these...
Once he shows up, I will really let him have it.
You are wearing a yukata too, Nana!
Nana, you look really cute today!
That yukata suits you surprisingly well!
That color is perfect for you!
I borrowed it from my cousin's older sister.
The pattern on mine was just too childish.
Your cheeks look really cute, too!
It looks like you just got out of bath.
Ah, about that... we have not been able to reach his cell at all.
No, I think he will... but probably with his local friends.
It would be nice... if he makes it...
That is what I was telling her!
Does not she look good in a yukata?
They do say that baby-faced kids unexpectedly look good in classic Japanese clothing.
Compared to the normal you, Takahashi, you look like a heron tonight!
If only yukatas had been the school uniform, I might have been so popular...
Nana, they said they would still give you one.
I was not sure who it was.
I am here with some classmates.
That guy just does not seem to need other people...
I cannot say it very well, but...
It is like we are not reaching him or something.
I just feel like whatever we do will be useless in the end.
Even though I got really excited and even wore a yukata...
Sorry, looks like I cannot get in touch with him.
Ah, do not worry about that.
I just wanted to complain about how he skipped out on the rehearsals.
The day before yesterday, for Nana-san.
It must be pretty harsh, do not you think?
I was just getting all festive, without knowing a thing.
Having someone always excited and happy around you.
As long you keep your spirits high, that is fine.
You look cute in that yukata.
I do not know what to say.
She is loitering in front of my house!
How long has he been watching me?
I had some business with you!
The female pervert stalker has gone berserk!
Yano, I have come for a school visit with your stupid-ass son!
I am sorry to have kept you waiting...
Please stay as long as you like.
I am all alone with Yano in his room...
Takahashi, why did you come poking around here?
I-I th-th-thought you m-might be sick, so...
Why would you think I was sick?
Well, like, you have missed every rehearsal so far.
Why did not you just get right to the point and ask why I have missed them?
You sure are one to speak right now, since you are the one who missed them!
Why did you miss them, then?
I have been drowning in my memories of Nana-san...
I am no good in the summer.
It is summer break, and you expect me to wake up at nine in the morning?
It was my own fault for worrying about you.
You got to eat some bean jelly, so do not complain.
It is not like I come here just to eat bean jelly!
And.. I finally got to see him.
Ah, is that a photo album?
I will take out all the bad pictures.
Was your middle school trip to Sapporo?
Hey... can I see a picture of Nana-san?
What are you going to do after looking at something like that?
I am not even sure... what I want to do after I see it.
You are pretty careless, are not you?
Do you realize where you are right now?
And you are my classmate, Yano...
She just fell on her own.
S-Sorry for making such a fuss...
Do not take me so seriously!
Is that... is that just it?
Hey, this is not a picture of Nana-san.
I do not have a single picture of her.
He does not budge an inch...
I thought of you every day.
I went to rehearsal all excited.
I got really happy wore a yukata.
I even come over your house.
But none of that seems to matter to you at all.
You would better be at rehearsal the day after tomorrow.
That is all I could say.
I just... wanted to see you.
Yano, you may not have someone left who you really, really love...
So... please do not think you are all alone.
I am always watching you, so...!
I am always watching over you, so...!
I am always watching over you.
So... please do not think you are all alone.
Did you check on the props?
They are going pretty well so far.
It is because Yamamoto-san's so reliable for things like this.
He is not here again today.
Now that it is come to this, I will just have to cover with my acting skills.
And this way, dirt will not stand out.
The red looks good on you.
We are totally going with white.
There is no other person who can make my heart beat this fast...
He took a pretty good picture.
You said you are watching me, did not you?
And what about that it all equals out junk?
Spewing out a guy line like that!
You are really conceited, are not you?
You are so mean, saying it like that!
I promise to always watch over you...
Summer break flew by in an instant.
But there is been no change between me and Yano.
It is pretty impressive that Yano can fall asleep in a place like this.
And he is using my bag as a pillow.
I wonder if he is dreaming?
I wonder what kind of dreams Yano has...
Is not that Yamamoto's older sister?
That guy with her is Kagawa.
Ah, you mean that guy who skipped out of our grade and graduated?
He is always with a different girl.
She is really going out with a loser.
He threw his water on her!
Hey, you guys are in the same class as Yuri, right?
I am sorry, but could you lend me some cash?
If you put that much Tabasco on, you will get hemorrhoids!
You do not resemble your younger sister much, do you?
Ah, you think I am some kind of idiot, do not you?
Whenever he is in bad mood, it always turns out like this.
He can be such a kid at times.
Your boyfriend does not have the best reputation, you know.
But is not he so cool?
His bad parts are part of his charm.
There is no perfect man out there.
As long as I can understand him, that is good enough.
They call that sort of thing being blind.
You have not really fallen in love with anyone before.
They call people like you immature know-it-alls.
Is Nana-san waiting for her boyfriend?
She should wait in a warmer place.
If she sees us, she will probably try to sponge us.
What do you want to do today?
Let us go to your place, Takeuchi.
I could really laugh at this!
Do you still think he is going to come?
Then why are you waiting around?
I will gather my rage and curse him to death!
That is not a hand warmer.
He says not to talk to other guys...
He completely enjoys every minute of this.
Every time I cry, he says I have made another girl cry all arrogantly.
He should fall off a bridge, break his neck, fall headfirst into a dump truck and smash his head, and die!
Why do not you say something?
You must think I am some kind of moron, do not you?
Hey... what do you think I should do?
Figure out your own problems by yourself.
Because I am a moron, I do not know!
I could tell you, but in exchange, you better do as I say.
Probably something where no ones cries or gets yelled at.
Where no one gets hit or has stuff thrown at them.
Then.. why do not we both go searching for our own happiness?
That is a bean jelly bun!
I really let him have it when I broke up with him.
You will definitely regret this later!
Happiness is a hot chocolate on a cold days!
I am sure this will become a memory.
If we are seen by anyone, it will become a huge fuss.
Because I graduated today, I do not really care.
This will only make you look even better.
I want to go to the beach.
It is cold and it stinks.
It was not supposed to be like this!
I just wanted to see something beautiful.
Then I will take you to the southern islands one day.
Well, first I have to save crazy money...
So about ten years, I guess?
Should I get us something to drink?
I said I only met with him.
Kagawa, a junior is here to see you.
So, did you win or lose?
Winning and losing does not matter in these kinds of situations.
I kept on punching until I was satisfied.
Which means you were also punched until he was satisfied.
Do not touch them, you moron!
Hey, I want to take a picture of this.
Are you an idiot or something?
It will be proof that you fought for me.
You really like crying, do not you?
There is no human out there who likes crying.
That is why I am here like this right now.
I absolutely will not betray you.
Nana-san was riding with Kagawa in his car, and...
I was using your bag as a pillow?
You should have just woken me up.
Well, you looked like you were having a happy dream, so I did not want to wake you up.
Like a steamed meat bun or a roasted sweet potato.
Something that warms you up on a cold day.
Well, it can be anything, like a book you like or a CD.
Let us go get some steamed meat buns.
It is already the season for steamed meat buns?
Kitto saigo no jikan da to
Nido to aenai kimi no senka to
I Am About To wa kono ame ni utare
Sotto kono mama kiete shimaitai yo
Stop the sunset i am about to wa utawanaideite
Umi ni ochiteyuku kanashii iro ne
Zutto kono basho de hitori ni sasete
Yuuhi yo kono mama shizumanaide ite
The sunset stretches my shadow long and thin.
Its colors deeply dye my heart.
When you said this was probably the last time,
I just want to forget them all.
I continued to watch the last sunset
and your back that I would never see again.
The sun that slowly, slowly sets in the distance.
Right now, I am being drenched by this rain.
Is it all right if I cry now?
Even if my tears begin to overflow, do not stop them.
Rain, freeze me down to my heart.
I just want to silently fade into nothingness.
The sun casts sad colors as it sinks into the ocean.
Just let me stay here alone forever.
Make it so the sun never sets.
Since the day we had the steamed meat buns together.
You do not have to be so protective of me like before.
I wonder if we will be able to talk like we did before...
I will only say this once, so listen carefully.
